Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
70 Pariyāpannaduka
Pariyāpannaduka
89.
294Napariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
295Naapariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  ekaṃ.
296Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
297Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  avigate pañca.
